body.name: Libman 238 Big Dust Pan, 13" Wide Opening
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 16 hrs 33 mins
features: The Ergonomic handle with hanger hole snaps into place onto your broom handle for convenient storage
An oversized scooping well ensures that no debris is swept over the dustpan, effectively collecting the debris the first time
The heavy-duty construction allows you to scoop and hold more dirt and debris and keeps the dustpan lasting longer
13" wide opening and 3" deep well for collecting more debris on every sweep
Quality made in the USA since 1896
body.description: Heavy-Duty, super-durable polypropelyne construction is what allows the Libman Big Dustpan to stand out among the rest when collecting dirt and debris. The oversized, deep well holds more dirt and accepts all standard sized brooms to make this dustpan the perfect companion to your Libman Angle Broom!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is heavy duty and wide enough for the larger Libman brooms
reviews.reviewText: Pretty heavy plastic - wide construction. Recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Battling the world's selfishness and indifference with this bad boy!
reviews.reviewText: Leave blowers are a metaphor for everything wrong with our society.At some point, it became perfectly ok to blow your trash into the sidewalk or street so that the wind can carry it down to your neighbor's house and end up on his/her lawn. It happened when we weren't looking...and now, you all you see are dozens of yard maintenance crews driving around blowing leaves around with their gas-guzzling leave blowers. (I secretly think that they laugh at the idiocy of one person paying them money to blow leaves into another person's yard, just to have THAT person turn around and pay them to blow leaves into yet ANOTHER person's yard.)Needless to say, I still take care of the leaves in my yard the old fashioned way...with a shovel and lawn bags. This dust pan is large/sturdy enough for me to scoop up massive piles of leaves to deposit into my over-sized lawn bags saving me some time.I suppose you could use this for picking up dust in your home, but to be honest...if you need a dustpan that's this big for your home you might see if you can get a spot on Hoarders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Good Dust Pan
reviews.reviewText: Oversize Dustpan works Well. The only thing is that right at the lip is a raised area so you have to give the dirt a good push over this bump. Its kind of weird designed thus way. The lip makes a pretty good seal with the floor do most if the dirt gets swept in. Not perfect to get all the first but better than others i have used. It is also iversized so note the dimensions before you buy. I also purchased a Libyan broom that "Snaps on". It is a tight fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Essential companion to your Libman "Big Broom."'
reviews.reviewText: Essential companion to the Libman "Big Broom."I'm a huge fan of the Libman "Big Broom." Why? Because it's big! It's a high-quality plastic-bristled angled broom that, because of its width, gets the job done in less time with fewer strokes. And this is the wide, sturdy dustpan you need at the end of the job. The less time spent cleaning, the better!I hope this helps with your decision.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2018
reviews.reviewText: The plastic becomes brittle within a very short time. And then it cracks and splits. Very disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does not fit Libman broom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for garage
reviews.reviewText: This size is much easier to use than a standard dustpan for sweeping up the usual debris on the garage floor. Had a similar one for many years and it worked great even when it ended up cracked across the middle. Not available locally by then so was glad to find one on Amazon. Have only used it a couple of times over the past three months but seems like it will last as long as the last one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2014
reviews.reviewText: Nice/large and very bright green. You won't lose this beauty!Great for outdoors - very lightweight.Arrived extremely promptly.Uh huh - ya'd think for such an important purchase you should'shop around'/ 'comparison shop'/'check the big boxes' and oh yeah are there other colors(?) - but hey take a chance and be blown away by this awesome -------- BIGGREENDUSTPAN.
